word:
"Cast not away therefore your confidence, which hath great recompense of reward. For ye have need of patience, that after ye have done the will of God, ye might receive the promise." Will those who have been tossed about by temptation and doubt remember these words? [Colossians 3:12-15, 17, 23, 24, quoted.]--Ms 52. 1902. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. Dec. 17, 1987. Entire Ms.
